```css
// Property: modalTransitionStyle
// Description: Transition style of this modal window.
// Component(s): openWindowParams
'.modal-transition-style-cover-vertical[platform=ios]': { modalTransitionStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_COVER_VERTICAL }
'.modal-transition-style-cross-dissolve[platform=ios]': { modalTransitionStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_CROSS_DISSOLVE }
'.modal-transition-style-flip-horizontal[platform=ios]': { modalTransitionStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_FLIP_HORIZONTAL }
'.modal-transition-style-partial-curl[platform=ios]': { modalTransitionStyle: Ti.UI.iOS.MODAL_TRANSITION_STYLE_PARTIAL_CURL }
```
